title: My google pixel 3a has a black screen but vibrates when the fingerprint is used
content: Hi team my google pixel 3a xl fell of from a table, the back of the phone hit the flord really hard,  the screen was not crack but now is totally black and when i first picked up the phone it was flashing and showing lines but now is completely black, however when i put my finger on the reader the phone vibrates, im thinking to replace the screen but i want to confirm if that is the onbly issue, i dont want to purchase a 100 dollars screen and the problem results to be another thing, what you recommend me to do?
